sections.instructions: Questions 1–6: Choose the correct letter A, B or C. Questions 7–10: Write ONE WORD ONLY.
sections.title: Free activities in the Burnham area / Paxton Nature Reserve

questions.question: The ‘Family Welcome’ event in the art gallery begins at
The film that is now shown in the ‘Family Welcome’ event is about
When do most of the free concerts take place?
Where will the 4 pm concert of Latin American music take place?
The boat race begins at
One of the boat race teams
options: A won a regional competition earlier this year
B has represented the region in a national competition
C has won several regional competitions

questions.question: Paxton is a good place for seeing rare ____ all year round.
This is a particularly good time for seeing certain unusual ____.
Visitors will be able to learn about ____ and then collect some.
Part of the ____ has been made suitable for swimming.

sections.instructions: Questions 11–15: Choose the correct letter A, B or C. Questions 16–20: Choose FIVE answers from the box.
sections.title: Changes in Barford over the last 50 years

questions.question: In Shona’s opinion, why do fewer people use buses in Barford these days?
options: A The buses are old and uncomfortable.
B Fares have gone up too much.
C There are not so many bus routes.

questions.question: What change in the road network is known to have benefited the town most?
options: A the construction of a bypass
B the development of cycle paths
C the banning of cars from certain streets

questions.question: What is the problem affecting shopping in the town centre?
options: C lack of restaurants and cafes

questions.question: What does Shona say about medical facilities in Barford?
options: B New medical practices are planned.
C The number of dentists is too low.

questions.question: The largest number of people are employed in
railway station car park
cinema
indoor market
library
nature reserve

sections.instructions: Questions 21–26: Write ONE WORD ONLY. Questions 27–30: Choose the correct letter A–D.
sections.title: Drawing project / Report writing

questions.question: A ____ surrounded by trees
Adding him and ____

Add Malcolm sitting on a tree trunk and ____
Ice-skaters on ____ covered with ice
Add a ____ for each person
how they planned the project
how they had ideas for their stories
an interpretation of their stories
comments on the illustrations

sections.instructions: Write ONE WORD ONLY for each answer.
sections.title: Ethnography in business

questions.question: to investigate customer needs and ____
could not easily see the ____ in measuring cups
check the ____ used
